content: अनुयोगः {@--1@} A question, inquiry, examination; अनियंत्रणानुयोगस्तपस्विजनः <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; निगृह्यानुयोगे <ls>P. VIII. 2. 94</ls>; वार्ता°मधुराक्षरया च वाचा <ls>R. 13. 71.</ls> {@--2@} Censure, reproof. {@--3@} Solicitation. {@--4@} Exertion, effort; अनुयोगं विना तैलं तिलानां नोपजायते <ls>Pt. 2. 140.</ls> {@--5@} Religious meditation; spiritual union. {@--6@} Comment.
